title: Colin Powell, Former Secretary of State, Dies at 84
sub_head: Family cites Covid-19 complications in statement and says the retired four-star general had been fully vaccinated
body:
WASHINGTON—Colin Powell, who as a retired four-star general and former White House national security adviser went on to serve as the first Black secretary of state, has died at 84.
His family cited Covid-19 complications in a statement on Facebook.
